section.title: Description
section.p: The permission catalog specifies a set of standard permissions. The permission catalog is the subject of separate HL7 standards. This reference is intended to show it relates to the rest of the information classes required to support the use cases.

stentry.p: Identifies the current state of the Permission. The state should correspond to the HL7 Act State machine.

A Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) permission. It specifies an information object and action/operation allowed on that object. A permission contains one operation and precisely one information reference.
